segments.text: Hello , IBA Bank , how can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , I'd like to talk to someone about making a withdrawal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can withdraw money from your account either over the counter or via the ATM .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but the problem is that I have a Savings Account with you , and I need to take some money from that . Do I really have to give 90 days notice if I want my money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , you only need to give 7 days notice if you wish to withdraw funds . Of course , you will lose some interest due to the withdrawal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's not a problem . I'll pop in later today to make a formal request . Thanks !
segments.speaker: S2
